ingredients.ingredient: 4 slices sharp Cheddar cheese, or to taste
20 dill pickle slices, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook hot dogs in a skillet over medium heat until browned on all sides, or grill for a charred exterior
Toast sourdough bread lightly and spread softened butter on each slice for added richness
Layer hot dog, cheese, and pickles on buttered bread; the warm hot dog will slightly melt the cheese
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you build a delicious hot dog sandwich with complementary flavors and textures?
